caption: I had the Margherita pizza and mozzarella  sticks as well as the hibiscus margarita and everything was beautiful and clean including the scenery. Delicious food and friendly staff.

My lady and I received food poisoning from this pizza place. We both think it was the sausage. And DONT EVER order the cheesecake I'm sure its only made once a month. This is a true story...  I did contact the store first. And the man who answered said "Do I wanna come up there and buy the ingredients" so now I'm going public
We do like ourselves a lot self love is important too
love everything about this place!
Ordered the pepperoni & hot soppressatta pizzas & both were delicious, great crust!
Really good pasta and pizza

Pizza was horrible soggy an no taste customer service was horrible will never order again.  I was yelled at by representative an ask well what was you expecting? Needless to say I will not return or recommend this restaurant
The place full of smoke.
Good place for delicious pizza. Great location to meet with friends. There was quick, helpful, and friendly service.
Vegan pizza wasn’t itttt ! Two little pieces of basil for a whole thing ? Not to mention it has 4 slices ? The whole thing was soggy it was just not a good experience

Bravo Ragazzi has a lovely outdoor seating for socially distant dining. It's tucked away off of the busy street so there is not much pedestrian traffic passing by. The staff all had PPE and gloves and seemed to be exercising caution.

We were in Brooklyn last week and wanted real NY pizza. This was not it:(. The calzone was just a folded pizza and NOT a calzone. I wanted pizza with red sauce and you would think a cheese pizza would have sauce. No sauce!  It was extremely expensive and not even warm when delivered. Very disappointed
Great dough, great ingredients. Trust me I’m a picky Italian!
AAA AMAZING AUTHENTIC AUMMA!!! Delicious

Ordered from here today for the first time and I was really disappointed. The sauce was flavorless and the cheese was sliding off the pizza in chunks. The crust was thin which isn't a problem, it's the fact that the sauce was really watery on top of the thin crust, which made mine soggy. The thickest part of this pie is the crust. All around a sad experience. Will order my neopolitan pizza at my usual spot.
High quality pizza dough and execution. Little rough around the edges service wise, but nothing notable.
I'm a postmates and doordash delivery courier. I cant really rate them well. I didn't really have to wait for the order because it was ready on arrival.
Best kept italian secret in bedstuy. Shhhhhhh
Pizza is light and yummy!! Definitely get the  Summer in Brooklyn drink!!
Great food

Thank you for existing, BEST PIZZA I'VE EVER HAD. Ingredients always taste so fresh and full of flavor. The dough on the pizza is out of this world, perfect consistency - simply amazing. Highly recommend the Margherita and the Mortazza Sua Pizzas.
A but pricey, but the calzone was the best I've ever had and the service was excellent.

Bravo Ragazzi has a lovely outdoor seating for socially distant dining. It's tucked away off of the busy street so there is not much pedestrian traffic passing by. The staff all had PPE and gloves and seemed to be exercising caution. I got a delicious latte and some wings, both were great. The wings seemed freshly fried and they have a variety of milk options. I recommend coming here for a bite and to support a friendly neighborhood business.
Great pizza great atmosphere

BEST PIZZA EVER! We have been here so many times that I lost the count! Favorite pizza in New York! The service is amazing, and now with the outdoor seating is nice and quite. Thank you guys for being so good! Good luck!!!
Pretty good pizza though a bit pricey
Great service and great atmosphere! The pizza, pasta dish, and the desserts were beyond amazing! I highly recommend and can't to go back!
Great spot in the area. Pizza is delicious and they have specials every day!

I've been here numerous times and can't say I've ever had anything I DIDN'T like. The calzones are enormous and the combinations of ingredients range from classic to refreshingly different.  Also, the customer service here is absolutely amazing.
Very yummy pizza. Even better service.
Excellent.
The pizza order was fast and correct. They had an amazing selection of pizza and they have spike lee inspired pizza. I enjoy oven pizza. Yummy

Ordered a broccoli rabe pizza with ricotta instead of sausage to make it vegetarian, and it was divine. The Tuesday buy one get one for $5 is an amazing deal. It's also great that they have vegan cheese options, but would would be cool if they had at least one veg meat option like the Beyond Italian sausage 😁. Definitely will be back!

Absolutely love this place. Consistently great service and delicious food. The owner is always very friendly over the phone as well. Unfortunately, we have only had delivery due to the pandemic, but we're looking forward to stopping in very soon!

I love and adore this place. Their pizza is absolutely amazing. I’m lactose intolerant and I always order the marinara pizza with various toppings and it’s always delicious! I’ve ordered them when I have small parties and they are always a hit. I recommend calling them instead of ordering from Uber or seamless. It’s way cheaper and Mike is very very accommodating over the phone. Definitely order!

I order from Bravi Ragazzi once or twice a week since I love pizza and being Italian-born, I tend to be picky. The pizza is really very good and the delivery times unbeatable! Today it was just 19 minutes from order to delivery. How do you guys do it? Keep it up!
(Translated by Google) Excellent Pizza, the staff is very attentive and helpful. They have a wood oven.  (Original) Excelentes Pizza, el personal es muy atento y servicial. Tienen horno de leña.
Best pizza in NY!
The meals and service were ahead of our expectations. I truly loved the atmosphere of this restaurant. Awesome place to take my family out for dinner.
Thanks to Bravi Ragazzi for delivering this amazing pizza to my door!

Update: received a voicemail from the manager mike offering to refund/remake the incorrect order. Changed the stars from one to three for great customer service. Will call tomorrow about a new order and then will be back to adjust the review a final time based on what I assume (based on the many great reviews) will be a successful delivery experience. 3/5.  Original: Delivery was 5 minutes early but don't order delivery. I received the wrong pizza, a plain margarita, when I'd actually ordered the buffalo mozzarella one and paid an extra $2 for arugula that was of course missing cause it was the wrong pizza. Would never reorder delivery from here again. Disappointing. 1/5.
Great and real pizza every time! Friendly staff. Community
Best pizza I have had, the dough he uses is beyond fantastic, even cold and leftover it has an elasticity that is unparalleled. All his ingredients are next level fresh and top quality

I just feel very lucky to have such an amazing pizza place in Bed-Stuy. I've been to so many of these Neopolitan-style places, and Mike just nails it 100%. He's from Napoli, so go figure. The sourdough crust is the best around, period. Compared to other places, he's got a very creative menu that changes according to things he wants to try. The salads and wine/beer/liquor selections are great, too. Can't recommend it more.

Amazingly ran pizza place, probably my favorite in BK. They give back to the community and have the most authentic delicious pizza that I’ve tried in the states (I used to live in Italy). Mike the owner is fabulous, always remembers his customers and we love sitting at the bar and chatting with him. I hope people actually get to go there to experience it after all these strange times are over.  Also, before you review that the pizza arrived cold..maybe you should blame the delivery vs the place that makes it? I encourage you to try to sit there, get the real experience, try the pizza out of the oven, and then leave a review. It would be the fair thing to do, don’t you think?!

This will be the first and last time ordering from here. It took an hour to come, the pizza had barely any sauce!! The pepperoni was thrown on the pizza, there was one piece of basil on the pizza... I want support local businesses during this time, but I will continue to cook at home. And this pie is too small for 2 people!!

Non pizza portions small. Service pleasant though slow. What they call gellato is ice cream that is not fresh. In response to owner answer. I specifically said non pizza portions were small...the lasagna I was served was "small" for the price charged. You may call what you serve "gellato" . It is not the smooth icy treat it ought be. Ice cream is not fresh when its loaded with icy crystal that strongly suggests it be in the freezer a LOOOOOOOOONG time.

Great pizza, lovely decor and awesome owner. A great diversity of pies and the crust is perfectly cooked. Also had side salads which were nice as well. Great addition to this part of the neighborhood!
Pizza was delicious, Ambience was great and servers were friendly
If you Know Pizza, you know this place. If you don’t like this place... you don’t know pizza...
Nice place if you want gluten free pizza
Tasty & very authentic food, easy going relaxing atmosphere and knowledgeable & friendly owner.
Great taste yummy
The best pizza in Brooklyn with original and unique options Great taste of Naples l❤️you
The best lasagna I've ever had in the 23 years of life I've lived.
The best pizza experience - a hidden gem. Reminds me of a place back home, effortless pizza straight outta that fire oven 🔥
This pizza’s aphrodisiacal qualities are unparalleled. Ooey gooey delightful bliss in the form of buffalo mozzarella and fluffy crust. Bless this establishment. Viva la Bravi Ragazzi.
Its a great place however, it is very limited on choices of pizza. There are no pasta entrees. Only authentic italian pizza

This place is run by two nice guys from Naples, Italy, so they know what pizza is. We had the Margarita but spiced up. Great stuff, really enjoyed that. Helping us from behind the counter was a young lady, also from Italy. True Italians don't mess with food, so I'm pleased to say this is a far cry from your run-of-the-mill pizzas.  Here's the quality everyone deserves.  And there it is. Including that final star. For being 3 cuts above the rest. Mediocre  food galore, terrible food in Little Italy, but this does really beat everything. Here's to you!
IT'S A VERY BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO GO
(Translated by Google) Pleasant stop in Brooklyn. 10 min walk from the metro but pizza GOOD!  (Original) Piacevole sosta a Brooklyn. 10 min a piedi dalla metro ma pizza BUONA!
Good food, very kid friendly and patient. Really happy to have a place where you can take kids and they have fun watching the pizza get made and it’s not overly stuffy.
Delicious food. Amazing service and atmosphere. Perfect date spot.

Cutie cozy pizza shop. If you want to taste real pizza thin crust and great flavor you will need to try them. For starter we had the bruschetta, Burrata and facaccia. The mozzarella was fresh, the tomato on the bruschetta was seasoned very nicely and fresh. I had an amazing salad rocket salad but did try the pizza from my husband and sister. He had the pepperoni it was nice and thin. The mozzarella again was fresh. My sister has the margarita pizza with extra basil, was very good and was not overly saucy. Desert was not my favorite but the bartender/waiter was very attentive and hands down will try this place again soon.

It's super hard to find a truly proper Neapolitan pizza anywhere in NYC, let alone one without a scene-seeking line that one must wait in for hours. Bravi Ragazzi is my Milanese husband's and my total go-to, both for dine-in and delivery. Super yummy, made with quality ingredients and flawless execution by a passionate staff (led by Mike). Above all, Bravi has a root and commitment to its community, demonstrated in children's programs and arts events, such as its recurring jazz night that supports local musicians. BedStuy's best kept secret, if you ask me. Faves are the He Got Game and—hey— just the plain Pepperoni. Husband goes with the classic Margherita.

Bravi Ragazzi makes an excellent, airy Neapolitan pizza. But what sets it apart is their customer service. We were there with a little kid, and the staff couldn't have been more accommodating. At the end of the meal, we had a few slices left that we were going to pack up, but by a freak accident they wound up on the floor. Our waiter replaced the pizza for us, even though we insisted that it wasn't a big deal. These guys are honestly great, and it's a local business I'm happy to support. I highly recommend the Diavola; the spicy soppressata is *chef's finger kiss*
Amazing Italian fare at very reasonable prices! Will definitely be back!!

Food was over an hour late last night. Called them this morning and the owner proceeded to yell at me and call me a liar. He reluctantly refunded me but was so mean i almost cried. Will not be giving them my business again.
The pizza is mediocre and overpriced and it took TWO hours to get a delivery.  Never again

I thought the food was ok, until I got home and puked the lasagna and the salad I had for dinner. I live next door to this place and always see it empty, gave it a chance today and paid the price. I’m never going back.
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza !!!  (Original) Excelente pizza!!!

First time I visit this restaurant and I will never return! I went there on jazz night, the place was nice, good atmosphere and music, the food was fine, but the real problem was the service. It took me almost 20 minutes to take my order and when they brought me the pizza they forgot the drinks, so I didn't want to wait again and I went to the bar for the drinks. There was a young lady, brown skin and courl hair I asked her for the drinks and she look at me really bad and said "I dont work here" I apologize and I said that as I see her behind the bar I thought she worked there, she look at me again and said "Im the owner of this place" and then she started to ignoring me so I had to asked to another lady for my drinks. If you are really the owner of this place, How do you not work there? but your lack of customer service will kill this restaurant
This place is amazing. Great food. Great atmosphere. Loved my margarita pie one of the best I ever had. Affordable.
Delicious Italian Pizza !
(Translated by Google) Delicious pizza if you are in the area not to be missed!  (Original) Pizza buonissima se si è  in zona da non perdere!
Best real Italian pizza in New York and beyond! Affordable too. Take the margarita, you will feel in Napoli!
Really good pizza, nice place and good service
It is awesome very very clean and beautiful stacked very friendly I will continue going back
Very nice spot and the owner has the best personality..
(Translated by Google) Best pizza  (Original) Best pizza
Exceptional food, helpful staff, always excellent character. They charge fair rates and the food quality is good. Highly recommended.
(Translated by Google) The best pizza in New York  (Original) La mejor pizza de New York

Awesome, plain and simple.  Amazing dough, sauce, and toppings combos to offer a full palate experience. This place has really made itself a part of the neighborhood.  I make Neapolitan style pizza myself, from dough to finish, and I rarely deviate from own kitchen unless to learn from those I’d consider masters- and Mike is it.  If you want some Neapolitan pizza that is more delicious as a whole than any of its individual components, and will make you reconceptualize what pizza is at its apex, then this is your spot. If you want to just grab a slice to go, then you clearly don’t know the style.  Taken from the perspective of an expert, this is as good as it gets.

The food is good but kids as young as five where running, playing potatoe saks games, sitting at the bar, jumping up and down in seats running in and out the front door, standing in and on the glass door frame. Talking to people in the kitchen area while they were making pizza. This is at 8:00pm at night. The owner said that it is a kid friendly restaurant and he can run it the way he wants too. This restaurant is small. The kids were brushing up against my sister while she was trying to eat and the women who had the kids keep drinking their wine. The kids could careless about what they had to say. Don't come to this restaurant it is a glorified chunky cheese with an extra order of rudeness. Two 👎's down
Best pizza in town! Thank you guys! Grazieeee!!!
Great service! Great food!!
The pizza was delivered with burnt Crust and cold. Cheese was not even melted. Arugula salad not bad. I do NOT recommend.
Favorite pizzeria, hosted two events here and enjoyed every moment! Finally got to come just to relax and it was divine.

The waitress was super nice and they have this hot olive oil to go on the pizza but I would put it on everything. And the food wasn't badly priced at all. We got a mixed greens salad and a (very pretty) pepperoni pizza to share and it was more than enough, which is good considering what you normally expect at NYC restaurants. I'm definitely coming back when I'm back in town.
Great pizza great place and they treat Juve fans good as well 😂 Definitely coming again
I work there and the pizza is great and the staff are friendly

My favorite pizza spot. They have Two Pies Tuesday.  You get one pie at full price and can add one on for $5. They also have Margherita Mondays. A Margherita pie and a margarita for I think $16. The limoncello is really good there. They also have gelato with a shot of espresso. It was the best gelato dessert I've had!
Best Pizza in Bed-Stuy!
Excellent pizza and service!
Love this place !! Must eat in person for sure! Amazing wood fired traditional Italian pizza not just some Cheap slice from a bodega ! Also they have drink specials like 50% off wine on Wednesday’s!
Great pizza and drinks
(Translated by Google) Good pizza. Really Italian. Great service and attention. Recommended.  (Original) Pizza buona. Veramente italiana. Ottimo servizio e attenzione. Consigliato.
Absolutely amazing Pizza and atmosphere!
Good Environment.
Outstanding Pizza
Best pizza in Brooklyn!!

First time ordering from these guys (on the phone, bc delivery apps are the worst!!).  Caviar omitted my daughter’s pizza, so i was in a jam and called them.  Mike said it would be 20-30.  callled after 35 min.  told driver on way.  called at 50 min.  told driver on way.  offered to comp pizza.  i didn’t want a comp (i paid).  i wanted a pizza in 20-30 as promised.  i was told an order came in on the app that bumped mine back.  apps are killing us.  btw:  pizza arrived lukewarm.  :/
Great pizza and wine

Do not heed the disingenuous bad reviews!! The pizza is excellent. Mike is friendly and earnest, and is doing great things at Bravi Ragazzi. The Cinque Formaggi pie is great, as are the vegan options. Do not hesitate to stop by/order in from here if you are in the area.
Cool place
Excelent service, best italian pizza in Brooklyn!! Give it a try

this is hands-down the absolute worst pizza i have eaten in my life on top of that they got my order wrong...will never eat from them again absolutely disgusting...i ordered a pepperoni pizza with onions,i got a plain cheese pizza with spinach...the sauce was terrible,the dough was not cooked properly. i want my money back!!!
Great service

(Translated by Google) Pleasant evening, delicious pizza seemed to be in Italy. Mike is very kind and attentive to every detail! We will definitely be back!  (Original) Serata piacevole, la pizza buonissima sembrava di essere in Italia. Mike è gentilissimo e attento ad ogni particolare! Ci torneremo sicuramente!
This was one of the best (true) Neapolitan Pizza I’ve ever had. Thanks Mike and Bravi Ragazzi for this short trip back to Napoli.

Ordered from this place in Brooklyn when I was visiting for a friend's wedding. I don't think you could get a smaller pizza. It cost 40 dollars for 2 of the smallest pepperoni pies I've ever seen. I don't mind paying that much for pizza but you better be sending me the best 4 ingredients in the form a pizza or you will never get my money again. Sauce met that standard. The rest was garbage. I've worked at pizza places and had life changing pizza from Joe's in Manhattan this was the biggest disappointment NYC had to offer. Avoid at all cost.
Exceptional service
(Translated by Google) Very delicious and very light!  (Original) Buonissima e legerissima!

The worst experience I have ever had with pizza. My roommate and I ordered two pepperoni pizzas, and they sent us two vomit pies. They were legitimately liquid and one of them wasn't even cut! I am still struggling to understand how a completely undercooked, tortilla crust, vomit soup, cesspool of a pizza makes it to a customer's door. Seriously concerned. I plan on going into this place in person out of genuine bewilderment and curiosity. I NEED to see the pizza being made. I NEED to see how on Earth something as simple as a pizza can be made so improperly. I'm a 22 year old guy, my standard for quality food at 11pm, let alone pizza, isn't very high, I wasn't expecting a gourmet pie, but dear god.... Dear God..... I have never seen a worse pizza in my life. I wish I could figure out how to add photos to reviews because oh lord....

This is one of my absolute favorite local establishments. Warm and friendly environment... great vibes... beautiful decor and music, and the absolute best pizza and pasta dishes and not to mention the best service ever!
Nice little spot in the heart of bedstuy pizza is great and there a bar what more do we need really lol
Authentic Neapolitan pizza! I sure would come back with my friends again! Really good service and good pizza! A MUST TRY!!!!
Yummy
Really dissapointing. Both pizzas were burnt to the point of being almost ineddible. Delivery was 20mins later than estimated too. Overall would not recommend.
This guy makes the real deal. #respect
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso
Had an amazing time at Bravi. The @hoodstowoods founders provided dinner for the volunteers n program providers. Service was excellent, very attentive staff.
Very good food. Staff very friendly. Will definitely go back.
(Translated by Google) I come from there, where they fight  (Original) Vengo da lì, dove litigano
Saraghinas over priced pizza is trash compared to this

Great service and delicious food!  The arugula salad was perfect with a lite dressing.  The Margarita Pizza's crust and toppings blended perfectly--not too heavy, not to light.  I highly recommend this establishment.  Again, the food is delicioso!  Yum! Yum!
Authentic neapolitan pizza. Fair price and absolutely good. Great job guys!
Long wait time
First time here and definitely I’ll be back... The pizza was amazing, I would like more crunchy for the next time but the flavors and the service was great!!! Thanks guys
Great pizza and a super relaxed atmosphere make this a perfect place to grab a quick and delicious dinner or to hang out at! The specials made it affordable. Definitely will be returning.

(Translated by Google) Clean, fast service, good food. Italian liqueurs and beer. The owner Mike is nice and courteous. Italian pizza in the middle of Brooklyn 👍  (Original) Pulito, servizio veloce ,cibo buono. Liquori e birra italiani. Il proprietario Mike è simpatico e cortese. Pizza italiana nel bel mezzo di Brooklyn 👍

Excellent Neapolitan Pizza, plus great service. This is my local pizza joint. Don't let the appearance deceive you. This place makes truly excellent pizza, the Neapolitan style which would make an Italian happy. If you're looking for cheap New York slice pizza (which has its own merits), head elsewhere. But if you're looking for a friendly environment, and very good pizza, then this is your spot. Mike the owner is always gregarious and welcoming, and they are great with kids.
(Translated by Google) Good guys.  (Original) Bravi, ragazzi.
Incredible pizza! Best I had in NYC! Thank you! Got a takeaway but had happy hour beers whilst we waited!
Not so good. Do not get the HE GOT GAME. There was no game and it was bitter.
Great pizza , awesome manager, warm atmosphere

I. Love. This. Pizza. I could literally eat here every night if I could afford it. Like it’s 8:25am and I’m already thinking about what time I should get a pepperoni pie. Mike, the owner is awesome. I highly recommend this place
(Translated by Google) the real Neapolitan pizza ... Michele the owner a true gentlemen  (Original) la vera pizza napoletana ...Michele il proprietario un vero gentlemen
The dough here is absolutely delicious! Also the tiramisu is delicious!
Nice place great food, but A little bit pricey
Just had take out pizza and a tasty bruschetta while we wait ! Gorgeous pizza 👍🏽 The lady who served us was so helpful and lovely. Highly recommend this place.
Great pizzas
(Translated by Google) A good Neapolitan pizza!  (Original) Una buona pizza napoletana!
Great pizza just like in Naples, Italy
This is what a neighborhood pizzeria should feel like. Good vibes and great service.
Delicious food every time! Definitely recommend this place!
Waited 30mins for my order and while i sat there the delivery guy proceeded to wipe his dirty foot before leaving out to deliver food. Unsanitary!
Good pizza
(Translated by Google) Good guys  (Original) Bravi Ragazzi
New discovery in neighborhood. Pizzas are different then usual and really delicious. At the end a tiramisu is a must. The owner (or the manager ) is the best! :)))
Authentic Napolitan Pizza in Brooklyn. Definitely recommend if you’re in the mood for good food !!!
Service is always great. I come hungry and leave happy!
Awesome food and service. I come for lunch and dinner.
Could eat here every night. Mike, the owner, is cordial with every guest. The staff is friendly as well. Service is always reasonably prompt. You can’t go wrong here! Fantastico!

Waited 2 hours for food -they didn’t bother calling to let me know they were gonna be later than the 30-40 minutes they advertised. When I finally called them to inquire, a VERY rude dude said he couldn’t deal with it and just cancelled my order, even though I said I’d wait. They literally TOOK my money and refused to deliver the food cause they were “too busy” -WHAT??? Do NOT order from here, not worth the hassle and verbal abuse and loss of money (Also, $20+ pizzas? LOL!!)
Great pizza and wine selection. Salads are really good! Very low key in neighborhood. I would suggest this place for a date.
Very fresh food and great drinks!
the pizza is yummy and perfect. great drinks and happy hour is 4-8 including weekends 🤗
Food was fantastic, and the service was a match to the food. Tuscan Pizza is a must, and the vegan options make it perfect. Cool atmosphere.
(Translated by Google) Great luchè  (Original) Grande luchè
Good quality food...recommend the lasagna and garlic focaccia
Great place where to try the real Neapolitan pizza! The service was fast and the food made on the order, definitely will go there again.
All goods u need at reasonable prices, clean comfortable  surroundings
Very sweet staff and owner. Good pizza. Go for the pizza. Stay for graffiti wall.
Food was delicious. Service was attentive, friendly, and awesome.
Friendly server great food
Even though it has a bar, it's super kid friendly. I haven't had anything hete that wasn't delicious!

I ordered the Bravi Ragazzi pizza and rocket salad and my life will never be the same. Full disclosure: I’ve never had proper NY pizza. Now, everything’s changed....and I’m doomed to go back to the primitive world, where they serve something called “pizza” that will look like an imposter and make me weep. Grazie, Bravi Ragazzi!!!
Gets 5 stars for being the best pizza I’ve had ever. Friendly staff, but reminds me of a school cantine inside. Lacks warmth decor wise and in temperature.
Great place! Excellent pizza!

We live around the cor from this spot so we figured we give it a try. The place is bland. All white, no warmth at all. If you just want to stop by and watch the game, that ain't gonna happen because they have no TV. Pizza was wet and mushy. They served the tiny portion of pasta in a takeout aluminum pan when we dined in. The service was fine and the music was good but we placed Bravi Ragazzi on our been there, ain't going back list.

One of the most heart warming spirits of restaurants. Just a guy from Napoli serving delicious authentic pizza Napolitana he's been eating his whole life (right out of a 750 degree oven), and serving great drinks.  Not only does Bravi Ragazzi embody the American dream with food and drinks that are spot on, the decor pays tribute both to its own story and the neighborhood.  Bravo!

I love these guys so much especially Mike!!!!! I love Alicia Keys night and the family vibes! This is my second home and I know other people, including the neighborhood regular Jeremy, feel the same. ❤️
wonderful new experience,  everything was superb.
It was pretty good. Very comfy. The staff was attentative.. cute place
The pizza was amazing my 2year old at 1/2 the pizza which says a lot to me right there. I will be going back.
Delicious Pizza, very friendly server... Loved it!
Delivery was almost an hour late. They use quality ingredients but you should be able to pick up a slice of pizza without it falling apart in your hands.

This is our go to place for our mid week pizza cravings. It is a low key local pizza spot with really good pizza and very friendly service. I suggest going there in person to try their tasty pizza directly from the oven. One area of improvement: the place is sometimes a bit cold during winter.
Great

Read reviews & sounded great!  Ordered for delivery, 2 & 1/2 hour later still no pizza. No follow up call on order. Louzy excuse on rain slowing delivery..... Even if a delicious pizza, yet to be tasted as MIA, not worth the trouble and terrible customer service!
Come and relax grab a pie just really nice

Their in house pizza dough is delicious. Prices are affordable and the ambience and staff make it inviting. We had a salad and a fantastic pizza with wine and beer for under $45. Great local spot for families, young people and couples.
Great food!

The atmosphere was bright,  trendy, laid back and had positive affirmations written all over the place. Very welcoming. We had a delicious salad (big poppa I believe) and the veganissima pizza with buffalo mozzarella on top. Our server was attentive, really sweet. They use a real brick oven to bake the pies and the dough was delicious. Pizzas were very affordable and perfect size for two. This is a great find in our neighborhood. Had a great white wine, but there's no beer on tap.

I have had amazing pizza there. I gotta say the best I have ever had. Which explains why I have been there so many times in the past few weeks lol. You go and you won't regret it. Try the tiramisu as well... it's to die for!
Yummy
My favorite neighborhood pizza spot. Amazing pizza with fresh ingredients and wonderful people that make you feel at home. Love this place!

Great Neapolitan pizza, tiramisù worth writing home about, especially if home is in the Bel Paese. Atmosphere and service slightly lacking, and menu is a bit confusing - but overall really great experience.
Great spot
Pizza is awesome and really italian like the owner... A place to recommend.
Great tasting pizza, good service and cool atmosphere
Omg so goood

The pizza is awesome! It was so good we went back 3 times during our time in Brooklyn. Fun environment friendly staff and Mike the owner is a really cool dude. We'll definately be back next time we're in town. Highly recommend.💯👌
The food is amazing,  love the Juicy Salad and the 99 problems calzone.  Great atmosphere,  good music,  I'll definitely go back !
good vibe there foodd is ok
Delicious pizza -- I tried all of them! 😁   Great service and nice ambiance.  The owner Michael and staff are wonderful and always with a welcoming smile!
Great customer service. Just great.  Good food.  A place I would love to have in my neighborhood.
First-class customer service. Warm environment. Food is outstanding. Would absolutely come back!

Don't let the big open white un-designed space scare you. This is a no frills pizza place with straight up fantastic pizza. Happy hour is great for cheaper beers, wine and aperol spritz. Music is sub-par like most other hip Brooklyn joints. But ya know what? Pizzas are actually really sensational. Prices do seem bit too high for the neighborhood if you ask me and tough competition from Saraghina is right around the corner. But, for what everyone else has to offer: This place has some serious potential! I will be back!
Great new authentic Neapolitan pizza.
Just love it !

Excellent pizza, quality ingredients. Casual and family-friendly space. They have a great bar to grab a drink too and looks like possibly sidewalk seating. Across from the historic and beautiful armory. Not crazy about the graffiti decor though, wish they would paint the walls.
Nice atmosphere,  awesome pizza.  And the staff are great..
Great pizza

I'm a Neapolitan-pizza freak and I was very impressed with this small pizzeria in Brooklyn. The dough is perfect (fluffy, airy and light) and the toppings are fresh, tasty and of high quality. Very excited to have found the authentic Neapolitan pizza in NYC!

I really, really enjoyed the pizza here: red sauce is delicious; sourdough is perfect; and they had a really great 90s R&B playlist going.  Toward the end of my meal, the server (who was lovely) showed me the expanded menu which included a number of new pizzas... mostly named after rap songs from artists who have some association with Bedford-Stuyvesant.  I don't know the owner, but my understanding is that he's from Naples.  And unless he's a huge fan of Biggie and Jay-Z (if so, then why not have those pizza names on the menus of the other restaurant locations??), then this choice feels like an uncomfortable mix of cultural appropriation, pandering, and condescension.  Perhaps it's an attempt to connect with the history of a neighborhood, but it is, at best, misguided and, at worst, offensive.  I strongly recommend changing these names.  I will probably come back here: as I said, the pizza is GOOD, and I live literally around the corner but... this bothered me.  Enough to write my first review ever of any restaurant--not in an effort to hurt this place, which I hope does really well, but to communicate what I believe to be an earnest marketing mistake.
Excellent Service, Friendly Staff, Great Ambiance, and Good Pizza!!!
Great new spot here in Brooklyn!  Great food, nice staff, and good atmosphere.  Pizza is awesome!!  Definitely worth checking out!!!
They just opened so they have a limited menu right now but some of the best pizza I have ever had in the city, very authentic!  So excited to have them in Bed-Stuy and to try to full menu.

Called for a delivery that arrived within 15 minutes.Opened the box ,was very disappointed. Ordered the half Magherita and Diavoili. Pizza cold, sauce and cheese scarce. Crust was doughy and pie uncooked.
Great pizza
